ModMetaData.name: [AP] Plaguemonger Meme
ModMetaData.author: AlexisPopcorn
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds a new meme called Plaguemonger. Precepts allow pawns to get increased immunity gain speed, they can start a unique ritual that infects everyone in the colony. Being sick makes them happy, they don't suffer from pain debuffs, and venerate rotten corpses and surrounding filth.
